entry.title: Paper Accepted to DaMoN'16
entry.content: Paper “FPGA-Accelerated Group-by Aggregation Using Synchronizing Caches” is accepted to Workshop on Data Management on New Hardware (DaMoN’2016).

entry.title: Paper Accepted to CIDR'15
entry.content: Paper “FPGA-based Multithreading for In-Memory Hash Joins” is accepted to 7th biannual Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research (CIDR’15).

entry.title: Paper accepted to Geoinformatica'14
entry.content: Paper “High performance FPGA and GPU complex pattern matching over spatio-temporal streams” will appear in Special Issue on Spatial and Temporal Database of Geoinformatica journal.

entry.title: Paper accepted to AMDS'13
entry.content: Paper “High-Performance Holistic XML Twig Filtering Using GPUs” accepted to Fourth International Workshop on Accelerating Data Management Systems Using Modern Processor and Storage Architectures (ADMS’13).
